column4: When I try to use a 3d application it sends me back to login, how do I fix this?
post the output of " lspci | grep VGA "
post the output of " glxinfo | grep endering "
it just put me back at login when I did that
okay can you do that in cmd line, press CTRL+ALT+F1
check if it says yes or no
it says cannot open display, that's the message
okay you have messed up something here, please post /etc/X11/xorg.conf & /var/logXorg.0.log
try removing Option "AddARGBVisuals"  & Option "AddARGBGLXVisuals from xorg.conf in Section "Device"
no dice still kicks me back to login,
it worked, you are magic gaurish
